subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The decisions Coach Jurgen Klinsmann has made, and the way he has executed them, are a back story to the United States’ captivating run at the World Cup.
snippet: The decisions Coach Jurgen Klinsmann has made, and the way he has executed them, are a back story to the United States’ captivating run at the World Cup.
